title: A Group of Climbers Was Scaling a Cliff—and Found Evidence of a Mass Panic Attack
description: The collection of markings is now thought to have been left by a herd of ancient sea turtles that had been frightened off by a sudden earthquake.

title: Magnitude 4.0 Earthquake Rattles Bay Area, with Aftershocks Likely to Follow
description: An earthquake of magnitude 4.0 rattled the Bay Area shortly after 6 A.M. local time on November 26—the quake is the largest so far in a string of recent activity near Gilroy, Calif.  The U.

title: Earthquake interrupts Ireland Test in Bangladesh
description: The third day of Ireland's second Test with Bangladesh is temporarily stopped by an earthquake in Dhaka on Friday.
